segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring out of the sink, and it's making me feel a bit uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware of what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing up on that stool, and it looks really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, it would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it's making me feel a bit sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice what's going on before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, and it's just a matter of time before someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something, but I'm not sure what I can do.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just so stressful to watch everyone in this kitchen, not paying attention to what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone stays safe and nothing bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
